select t1.id , t1.model_id , t2.model_name as modelIdAlias , t1.batch_no , t1.sub_type , t1.desige_by , t1.product_by , t1.contract_no , t1.registrater_no , t1.registrater_date , t1.finished_date , t1.business_period_year , t1.business_period_hour , t1.is_business_period , t1.start_operate_date , t1.operate_status , t1.engine1 , t1.engine2 , t1.number_of_flight , t1.flight_num , t1.takeoff_landing_num , t1.custumer_name , t1.operator , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.company_id , t1.statistical_date , t1.statistical_person , t1.total_flight_days from csmp_bd_aircraftinfo t1 left join csmp_bd_aricarftmodel t2 on t1.model_id =t2.id
and t1.ID like '%'||#{bean.id}||'%'
and t1.MODEL_ID like '%'||#{bean.modelId}||'%'
and t1.BATCH_NO like '%'||#{bean.batchNo}||'%'
and t1.SUB_TYPE like '%'||#{bean.subType}||'%'
and t1.DESIGE_BY like '%'||#{bean.desigeBy}||'%'
and t1.PRODUCT_BY like '%'||#{bean.productBy}||'%'
and t1.CONTRACT_NO like '%'||#{bean.contractNo}||'%'
and t1.REGISTRATER_NO like '%'||#{bean.registraterNo}||'%'
and t1.REGISTRATER_DATE >= #{bean.registraterDateBegin}
and t1.REGISTRATER_DATE <= #{bean.registraterDateEnd}
and t1.FINISHED_DATE >= #{bean.finishedDateBegin}
and t1.FINISHED_DATE <= #{bean.finishedDateEnd}
and t1.BUSINESS_PERIOD_YEAR like '%'||#{bean.businessPeriodYear}||'%'
and t1.BUSINESS_PERIOD_HOUR like '%'||#{bean.businessPeriodHour}||'%'
and t1.IS_BUSINESS_PERIOD like '%'||#{bean.isBusinessPeriod}||'%'
and t1.START_OPERATE_DATE >= #{bean.startOperateDateBegin}
and t1.START_OPERATE_DATE <= #{bean.startOperateDateEnd}
and t1.OPERATE_STATUS like '%'||#{bean.operateStatus}||'%'
and t1.ENGINE1 like '%'||#{bean.engine1}||'%'
and t1.ENGINE2 like '%'||#{bean.engine2}||'%'
and t1.NUMBER_OF_FLIGHT like '%'||#{bean.numberOfFlight}||'%'
and t1.FLIGHT_NUM like '%'||#{bean.flightNum}||'%'
and t1.TAKEOFF_LANDING_NUM like '%'||#{bean.takeoffLandingNum}||'%'
and t1.CUSTUMER_NAME like '%'||#{bean.custumerName}||'%'
and t1.OPERATOR like '%'||#{bean.operator}||'%'
and t1.REMARK like '%'||#{bean.remark}||'%'
and t1.CREATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.createdBy}||'%'
and t1.CREATION_DATE like '%'||#{bean.creationDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateIp}||'%'
and t1.VERSION like '%'||#{bean.version}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like '%'||#{bean.attribute01}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like '%'||#{bean.attribute02}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like '%'||#{bean.attribute03}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like '%'||#{bean.attribute04}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like '%'||#{bean.attribute05}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like '%'||#{bean.attribute06}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like '%'||#{bean.attribute07}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like '%'||#{bean.attribute08}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like '%'||#{bean.attribute09}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like '%'||#{bean.attribute10}||'%'
and t1.COMPANY_ID like '%'||#{bean.companyId}||'%'
and t1.total_flight_days like '%'||#{bean.totalFlightDays}||'%'
and t1.statistical_date like '%'||#{bean.statisticalDate}||'%'
and t1.statistical_person like '%'||#{bean.statisticalPerson}||'%'
and ${sfnConditions.sql}
order by t1.finished_date DESC

select t1.id , t1.model_id , t2.model_name as modelIdAlias , t1.batch_no , t1.sub_type , t1.desige_by , t1.product_by , t1.contract_no , t1.registrater_no , t1.registrater_date , t1.finished_date , t1.business_period_year , t1.business_period_hour , t1.is_business_period , t1.start_operate_date , t1.operate_status , t1.engine1 , t1.engine2 , t1.number_of_flight , t1.flight_num , t1.takeoff_landing_num , t1.custumer_name , t1.operator , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.company_id , t1.statistical_date , t1.statistical_person , t1.total_flight_days from csmp_bd_aircraftinfo t1 left join csmp_bd_aricarftmodel t2 on t1.model_id =t2.id

and t1.ENGINE1 like '%'||#{bean1.engine1}||'%'
and t1.ENGINE2 like '%'||#{bean1.engine2}||'%'
and t1.NUMBER_OF_FLIGHT like '%'||#{bean1.numberOfFlight}||'%'
and t1.FLIGHT_NUM like '%'||#{bean1.flightNum}||'%'
and t1.TAKEOFF_LANDING_NUM like '%'||#{bean1.takeoffLandingNum}||'%'
and t1.CUSTUMER_NAME like '%'||#{bean1.custumerName}||'%'
and t1.OPERATOR like '%'||#{bean1.operator}||'%'

and t1.statistical_person like '%'||#{bean1.statisticalPerson}||'%'

and t1.FINISHED_DATE <= #{bean.finishedDateEnd}

and t1.ENGINE2 like '%'||#{bean.engine2}||'%'

and t1.FLIGHT_NUM like '%'||#{bean.flightNum}||'%'
and t1.TAKEOFF_LANDING_NUM like '%'||#{bean.takeoffLandingNum}||'%'
and t1.CUSTUMER_NAME like '%'||#{bean.custumerName}||'%'
and t1.OPERATOR like '%'||#{bean.operator}||'%'

select t1.id , t1.model_id , t1.batch_no , t1.sub_type , t1.desige_by , t1.product_by , t1.contract_no , t1.registrater_no , t1.registrater_date , t1.finished_date , t1.business_period_year , t1.business_period_hour , t1.is_business_period , t1.start_operate_date , t1.operate_status , t1.engine1 , t1.engine2 , t1.number_of_flight , t1.flight_num , t1.takeoff_landing_num , t1.custumer_name , t1.operator , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.company_id , t1.total_flight_days , t1.statistical_date , t1.statistical_person from csmp_bd_aircraftinfo t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into csmp_bd_aircraftinfo
id,
model_id,
batch_no,
sub_type,
desige_by,
product_by,
contract_no,
registrater_no,
registrater_date,
finished_date,
business_period_year,

update csmp_bd_aircraftinfo t1
t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.model_id =#{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.batch_no =#{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.sub_type =#{subType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.desige_by =#{desigeBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.product_by =#{productBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.contract_no =#{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.registrater_no =#{registraterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.registrater_date =#{registraterDate,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.finished_date =#{finishedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.business_period_year =#{businessPeriodYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.business_period_hour =#{businessPeriodHour,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.is_business_period =#{isBusinessPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.start_operate_date =#{startOperateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.operate_status =#{operateStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.engine1 =#{engine1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.engine2 =#{engine2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.number_of_flight =#{numberOfFlight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.flight_num =#{flightNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.takeoff_landing_num =#{takeoffLandingNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.custumer_name =#{custumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.operator =#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.remark =#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.creation_date =#{creationDate},
t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate},
t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.version =t1.version+1,
t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.company_id =#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.total_flight_days =#{totalFlightDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.statistical_date =#{statisticalDate},
t1.statistical_person =#{statisticalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}

mapper.select: select count(t.batch_no) from CSMP_BD_AIRCRAFTINFO t where t.model_id = #{id}

select t1.id , t1.model_id , t2.model_name as modelIdAlias , t1.batch_no , t1.sub_type , t1.desige_by , t1.product_by , t1.contract_no , t1.registrater_no , t1.registrater_date , t1.finished_date , t1.business_period_year , t1.business_period_hour , t1.is_business_period , t1.start_operate_date , t1.operate_status , t1.engine1 , t1.engine2 , t1.number_of_flight , t1.flight_num , t1.takeoff_landing_num , t1.custumer_name , t1.operator , t1.remark , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.company_id , t1.total_flight_days , t1.statistical_date , t1.statistical_person from CSMP_BD_AIRCRAFTINFO t1 inner join csmp_bd_aricarftmodel t2 on t1.model_id = t2.id where t1.company_id=#{comId}
